thread.title: BRIEF-Stone Energy Corp Announces Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.85

title: BRIEF-Stone Energy Corp Announces Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.85
text: March 12, 2018 / 11:00 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Stone Energy Corp Announces Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.85 Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Stone Energy Corp: * STONE ENERGY CORPORATION ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS * STONE ENERGY CORP - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.85 * STONE ENERGY - NET DAILY PRODUCTION DURING Q4 AVERAGED ABOUT 17.6 MBOE PER DAY VERSUS 19.2 MBOE PER DAY FOR QUARTER ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2017 * STONE ENERGY CORP QTRLY ‍TOTAL OIL, NATURAL GAS AND NGLS REVENUE $76.2 MILLION VERSUS $112.2 MILLION​ * STONE ENERGY - ‍Q4 VOLUMES AFFECTED BY 5 DAYS OF DOWNTIME FROM HURRICANE NATE & 10 DAY PLANNED SHUT-IN OF POMPANO PLATFORM IN NOV​ * STONE ENERGY CORP - ‍AUTHORIZED FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE BUDGET OF UP TO $212 MILLION​ * STONE ENERGY - ‍ FINANCIAL STATEMENTS DATED ON/AFTER MARCH 1, 2017 WILL NOT BE COMPARABLE WITH THOSE ISSUED PRIOR TO THAT DATE ON ACCOUNTING CHANGES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
